articles.title: Trump-Backed Protocol Launches Proposal for WLFI Trading on Independence Day
articles.author: Coinspeaker
articles.summary: On July 4, World Liberty Financial filed a proposal to open WLFI token trading, marking a major decentralization milestone for the protocol co-founded by members of WLF. WLFA's community voted in favor of the proposal. WF is a decentralized finance protocol.

articles.title: From cash to code: SA's payments shift
articles.author: Anthony Sharpe
articles.summary: SA is at a pivotal point in the evolution of its payments landscape. It pioneered real-time clearing in 2006 and has a strong, regulated banking system and a growing fintech ecosystem. However, 55% of transactions still use cash. There is progress with the launch of PayShap and Pan-African Payment and Settlement System. Other developments include innovations in offline payments to address limited internet access and improvements in contactless experiences.
